feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:02AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water Along Steese Highway From Chatanika to Eagle Summit... Heavy showers fell early this morning along the Steese Highway from Chatanika to Eagle Summit. Small creeks in this area could reach bankfull this morning, including Nome Creek and Birch Creek. Culverts under the Steese Highway could run full this morning. Small creeks should drop late today.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Middle Tanana Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:21AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...PERIODS OF RAINFALL WILL CONTINUE ACROSS SOUTHCENTRAL THROUGH AROUND NOONTIME SUNDAY... Deep and moist southwesterly flow will continue through late Saturday afternoon/early Saturday evening. As a result, expect periods of rain to continue. There may be a drier period for much of Saturday evening through the overnight hours. Then another
entry.cap:areaDesc: Anchorage

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 1:46PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rising Water Levels on Rivers Draining the Brooks Range... Several weather fronts moving across the eastern Brooks Range will bring rising water levels to rivers and streams. Additional rainfall totals from 0.50 to 1.00 inches are possible through Friday. Some isolated locations could see higher amounts. Water levels are expected to remain within bank and below flood stage.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Northeastern Brooks Range

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 3:30AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER CONCERNS TODAY FOR CONNECTICUT... The potential for fire spread is enhanced. The prolonged absence of wetting rains, along with moderate to severe drought conditions, have led to very dry soil moistures and ground fuels. entry.cap:areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
